name: Airthrashers
description:
Airthrashers is a fast paced, one-stick, bullet hell, arcadey shooter in which you just shoot the heck out of enemy planes!

This game has got:
  • Explosions!
  • Fast gameplay!
  • Difficult enemies!
  • Some customization options!
  • ALOTOF JUICE
  • EXPLOSIONS!!!
  • Did i already say explosions?

I made this due to me being bored and not completing a game in a while, because of me prototyping my main project :/. I was very inspired by Vlambeers game Luftrausers, so i made it with my own spin!

Anyway, have fun and good luck pumping lead, pilot!

Controls:
  • A and D to move left or right!
  • The Left mouse button to pump lead!

(P.S, there's also a boost which you can use by pressing the Right mouse button, but it's a bit finicky :] )

Please, for the most stable experience and to save your highscore for unlocks, play the windows build. Thanks!
